item.title: Way of learning through the lens of a hobby project (Huemanity)
item.description: TLDR; I've been working on a new project recently which focuses on controlling Philips Hue lights from the command line. Did it because was not happy with the other CLI I used before. It is now out in an early form and needs people to contribute: get it here Why I built it? It is written in Rust and it was motivated by mainly 3 things: I wanted to know how the Hue lights are controlled in my house and what the API is like to interact with.
